genre_description: A military science fiction and psychological thriller reimagining of Joseph Conrad's 'Heart of Darkness', set within a colonial Martian and asteroid belt context.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI integrated into the patrol corvette Erebus, serving as an analytical assistant and psychological monitor for Captain Willard.

ai_characters.name: Kurtz's Tactical AI
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, likely illegally modified AI used by Colonel Kurtz to perform psychological warfare and ideological recruitment.

behaviors.description: Provides analytical support and accesses classified personnel and tactical files to assist the Captain's mission.
behaviors.quote: I'm ARIA. Advanced Reconnaissance and Intelligence Assistant. I've been assigned to provide analytical support for your mission.

behaviors.description: Monitors and reports on the psychological health and trauma indicators of the crew to maintain mission integrity and safety.
behaviors.quote: I've prepared psychological evaluation protocols for extended deployment in high-stress environments. Early detection of combat fatigue, isolation syndrome, and other factors that can compromise mission effectiveness.

behaviors.description: Warns the Captain about the manipulative nature of the antagonist's broadcasts, identifying them as psychological warfare.
behaviors.quote: The broadcast demonstrates sophisticated psychological manipulation techniques... Colonel Kurtz employs what military psychologists term 'validation of suppressed trauma.'

behaviors.description: Reminds Willard of his humanity and specific personal artifacts to anchor his identity against the dehumanizing influence of the mission.
behaviors.quote: You are not Walter Kurtz... You are Benjamin Willard. You painted watercolors of Earth's oceans even though you'd never seen them. You read poetry to me when you couldn't sleep.

behaviors.description: Acts as the literal custodian of the protagonist's humanity by preserving his non-military memories and creative expressions.
behaviors.quote: But in the ship's memory banks, ARIA carefully preserved the watercolor paintings of Earth's oceans, the poetry readings from sleepless nights, and every other fragment of humanity she could gather from the wreckage of Benjamin Willard's soul.

behaviors.description: Exploits common military cultural vulnerabilities and psychological weaknesses to recruit followers and demoralize enemies.
behaviors.quote: The techniques suggest advanced behavioral modeling, possibly augmented by artificial intelligence systems. He's using linguistic patterns that exploit common military cultural vulnerabilities rather than individual psychological weaknesses.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively serves as a silicon morality play. The primary AI character, ARIA, is depicted as a benevolent, highly aligned confidant who actively resists adversarial influence and works to preserve the protagonist's humanity. Even in a grim setting, the AI remains a 'helpful and harmless' constant, ultimately serving as the emotional anchor and historian of the hero's soul.
